comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.waze

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

_No response_

||adsassets.waze.com^
||ads-resources.waze.com^

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

For FF - add to user rules
`cdn.privacy-mgmt.com#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.self!==window.top&&document.referrer.startsWith("https://www.space.com/")){var a=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('.message-component > button[title="AGREE"]');b&&(a.disconnect(),b.click())});a.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){a.disconnect()},1E4)}});`

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: excalidraw.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://excalidraw.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fexcalidraw.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @CactiChameleon9 > Opening a saved file, specifically an embedded excalidraw file in a png, does not work with adguard enabled > > To reproduce: > 1. Open excalidraw > 2. Draw a squigle > 3. Click the 3 line menu in the top left corner > 4. Press export image > 5. Tick "Embed Scene" > 6. Save the png file somewhere > 7. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
On my end this issue occurs when `cxense.com` is blocked and it's blocked by `AdGuard Tracking Protection filter` (I have fixed it, but you don't have this list enabled).
As far as I can see, it's also blocked by `Estonian List` and if I add rules from https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/149530#issuecomment-1531098454, then it works correctly.

You can also try this rule:
```adblock
||cxense.com$third-party,badfilter
```
or
```adblock
@@||cxense.com/*.js$domain=euractiv.com
```
or
```adblock
@@||cxense.com^$domain=euractiv.com
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
